title: @ RIOT!!!! "You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours. "
body: I don't know how to use RP cards and my code kept not working. Now it says what the title says. I learned how to do it though, you don't put any spaces or dashes in between numbers. I was looking forward to buy the Looting Stars thing but now I can't because it is disabled. Please Riot.

replies.body: Don't worry we'll help you out!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will assist individually.  We'll reply back asap!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=REdd7kzB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-31T00:29:45.656+0000)
>
> Don't worry we'll help you out!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will assist individually.  We'll reply back asap!

I hit a support ticket. I might send another one because i think i sent it in the wrong request. So what do i send the request under
Nope, one ticket is more than enough and it will get to the right place.  Making multiple tickets may only cause confusion or delays.  Hang tight until you get a response back.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=REdd7kzB,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-12-31T00:41:43.363+0000)
>
> Nope, one ticket is more than enough and it will get to the right place.  Making multiple tickets may only cause confusion or delays.  Hang tight until you get a response back.

They haven't responded D: goodbye looting stars skin

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=REdd7kzB,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-12-31T00:41:43.363+0000)
>
> Nope, one ticket is more than enough and it will get to the right place.  Making multiple tickets may only cause confusion or delays.  Hang tight until you get a response back.

Okay thanks! I'm trying to get the looting stars pack so i hope this happens by the end of today! ;__; also thank u i luv u
